    CompanyRepository - Interface in repository
    define storage and retrieval operations for Company entities used to check existing company records or register new ones allows multiple implementations such as in-memory or persistent database
    CompanyRepresentative - Class in model

    I

    id - Variable in class Internship
    unique internship identifier
    id - Variable in class InternshipApplication
    unique application identifier
    importStaff(String) - Static method in class CsvParser
    read staff records from classpath resource
    importStudents(String) - Static method in class CsvParser
    read student records from a CSV file and convert them into Student objects.
    InMemoryCompanyRepository - Class in repository
    in-memory implementation of CompanyRepository used for runtime storage without writing to disk keys are stored in lowercase for case-insensitive matching
    InMemoryCompanyRepository() - Constructor for class InMemoryCompanyRepository
     
    InMemoryInternshipAppRepository - Class in repository
    in-memory implementation of InternshipAppRepository provides runtime storage and lookup support for internship applications data does not persist to disk and resets when application restarts
    InMemoryInternshipAppRepository() - Constructor for class InMemoryInternshipAppRepository
     
    InMemoryInternshipRepository - Class in repository
    in-memory implementation of InternshipRepository stores internship records using a hash map keyed by internship id data is volatile and cleared when application terminates
    InMemoryInternshipRepository() - Constructor for class InMemoryInternshipRepository
     
    InMemoryUserRepository - Class in repository
    in-memory implementation of UserRepository stores User objects using a hash map keyed by user ID data is volatile and lost when application terminates
    InMemoryUserRepository() - Constructor for class InMemoryUserRepository
     
    INTERMEDIATE - Enum constant in enum class Internship.Level
     
    Internship - Class in model
    represent an internship posting created by a company representative stores available slots, timeline, level, majors, company and visibility state supports status change and slot confirmation logic
    Internship(String, String, String, Internship.Level, String, LocalDate, LocalDate, CompanyRepresentative, int, boolean, Company) - Constructor for class Internship
    create new internship posting in pending state slot count automatically bounded between 1 and 10
    Internship.Level - Enum Class in model
    represent internship year of study requirement BASIC: year 12 only INTERMEDIATE: suitable for year 3 and above students ADVANCED: suitable for year 3 and above students
    Internship.Status - Enum Class in model
    represent approval state PENDING: awaiting staff review APPROVED: visible for student application REJECTED: denied by staff FILLED: all available slots confirmed
    InternshipApplication - Class in model
    represent a student's internship application record stores links to student and internship, tracks status and acceptance state includes withdrawal request flag for staff approval workflow
    InternshipApplication(String, String, String) - Constructor for class InternshipApplication
    create new internship application in pending state
    InternshipApplication.Status - Enum Class in model
    represent possible application states pending: awaiting representative decision successful: approved by representative unsuccessful: rejected by representative withdrawn: withdrawn by student or student has accepted another offer
    internshipApplications - Variable in class CompanyRepController
    internship application persistence repository
    InternshipAppRepository - Interface in repository
    repository interface for managing persistence of internship applications supports CRUD operations and custom query-based retrieval
    internshipApps - Variable in class InMemoryInternshipAppRepository
    map storing internship applications keyed by application id
    InternshipBrowserView - Class in view
    view class responsible for displaying internships and applying user-defined filters provides browsing capabilities for students, company representatives, and staff users rendering and available actions vary based on caller role
    InternshipBrowserView(InternshipBrowserView.Role, StudentController, CompanyRepController, StaffController) - Constructor for class InternshipBrowserView
    construct a browser view with fixed role and controller dependencies
    InternshipBrowserView.Role - Enum Class in view
    enumeration of supported viewer roles for browser behaviour
    InternshipFilter - Class in model
    represent a filter object used to search, sort or narrow internship results all attributes are optional; null values indicate no filtering condition for that field this class uses method chaining for cleaner filter building
    InternshipFilter() - Constructor for class InternshipFilter
    create an empty filter where all conditions are unset
    internshipId - Variable in class InternshipApplication
    id of internship associated with this application
    InternshipRepository - Interface in repository
    repository interface that defines persistence operations for internship records supports CRUD operations, lookup queries, and filtered search
    internships - Variable in class CompanyRepController
    internship persistence repository
    internships - Variable in class StaffController
    repository of all internships
    internships - Variable in class StudentController
    repository storing all internships
    internships - Variable in class InMemoryInternshipRepository
    map storing internship records keyed by internship id
    isActive() - Method in class InternshipApplication
    check if application is in a state counting as active active means pending review or successful offer
    isApproved - Variable in class CompanyRepresentative
    approval flag managed by staff
    isApproved() - Method in class CompanyRepresentative
     
    isFull() - Method in class Internship
    check if internship has reached maximum confirmation limit
    isLevelAllowed(Student, Internship) - Method in class StudentController
    check if student is permitted to apply to specified internship level year 12 students can only apply for BASIC level
    isLoggedIn - Variable in class User
    login state of user, true if logged in
    isLoggedIn() - Method in class User
    check if user is currently logged in
    isOpen(LocalDate) - Method in class Internship

    isWithdrawalRequested() - Method in class InternshipApplication
